name: The mystery of Sophronia
description:
A city in Desert, two metal balls are hiding the mystery of this city which were divided into two parts. For you, the residents there think you are just a new worker with no name, but the identity of agent from 21th century is asking you to finish your mission. So Let’s start your mission!

Direction key to move, 'E' to interact with NPC, 'F' to pick up brick, 'G' to drop brick, 'R' to pick up mystery ball.

 by Changyuan Huang for DATT 3300: Lab 01.
